name: dscsa
description: The goal of this repository is to provide an example implementation of the DSCSA in Solidity/Truffle.  The DSCSA is a [FDA regulation](https://www.fda.gov/drugs/drug-supply-chain-security-act-dscsa/drug-supply-chain-security-act-law-and-policies) to track drugs through the supply chain.  The FDA completed a DSCSA blockchain pilot in 2020: [FDA Blockchain Pilot Report](https://www.ibm.com/downloads/cas/9V2LRYG5).
